subject.warning: License Renewal Reminder: {{licenseName}} expires in {{daysUntilExpiry}} days

urgentNotice: This license will expire in less than 7 days. Immediate action required!
mainText: Your software license {{licenseName}} from {{vendor}} will expire in {{daysUntilExpiry}} days on {{expirationDate}}.
actionText: To ensure uninterrupted service, please review this license and take action to renew it before the expiration date.
renewalReminder: üí° Tip: Contact your vendor early to avoid any service disruptions. Renewal processes can take time.
contactVendor: Please contact {{vendor}} to renew this license or update the expiration date in your dashboard if you've already renewed it.
